attributes.action: Reimburse students whose courses and accommodation are affected by Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details:
Students will be forced to pay tuition they are not receiving this should be paid back to them.
Students will be forced to pay for Halls of Residence accommodation they unable to stay in this should be paid back to them.
attributes.background:
Reimburse tuition for students whose courses are affected by Covid-19, for example online classes for nurses is inadequate tuition.
Reimburse students who have been forced to leave accommodation due to Covid-19
